product.title: Japanese City Garden Temple Micro Building Set
product.body_html:
• Description
  • FAQ
  • Shipping

  • Looking for a unique building set for your little architect?

    This unique temple is made from scraps and plants making it a rewarding build with over 1600 micro pieces that can be displayed in every corner of the house. It's the little details that bring this tower to life. Featuring multiple floors, each with a unique space and decor.

    ⛩ Compatible with Micro building blocks
    ⛩ Contains over 1600 pieces
    ⛩ Includes 6 mini-dolls
    ⛩ Not compatible with leading blocks of standard size (16mm) 
    ⛩ Excludes original box to protect the environment. For further details please see below.*


    Assembled easily for a beautiful result

    Let your imagination run wild with this micro building set. With endless possibilities, use it to decorate your bedroom, living room, study or office. This set has a lot of details for you to admire after completing the build. It is easy to build with step by step instructions included in the set and there is no glue required.

    Built for everyone to have fun

    Our building blocks are designed with advanced engineering features providing a unique building experience for all building block fans. We always provide an easy-to-follow instruction booklet for you to build your perfect Japanese Temple with no hassle.

    The perfect gift for those who love their crafts!

    You will love seeing your family and friends in excitement when they receive our building blocks, leaving an everlasting smile on your loved ones by surprising them with these super innovative and excellent building blocks today.

    Micro Blocks: Smaller than the traditional building block.

    Features

    🌸 100% premium quality (ABS) plastic
    🌸 Sharp brilliant colors and solid feel
    🌸 Challenging and rewarding to stimulate all brains
    🌸 High-quality durable non-toxic green material

    * Our Building Block sets are packaged in safe and secured protective bags. They do NOT come in the original box to reduce the carbon footprint, save the planet and reduce postage costs on your behalf. It will come with all the pieces and a detailed instruction booklet for you to follow.

    WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD - Contains small parts; not suitable for children under 6 years old unless there is adult supervision.

     

  • Do you ship worldwide? Yes, we ship to over 300 countries and are proud to provide free shipping to the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, and many countries in Europe.

    What are the blocks made from?     All our building blocks are manufactured from a High-Quality Premium strong, resilient plastic known as acrylonitrile butadiene styrene (ABS) and will stand the test of time and provide hours of fun building their own creations

    Does this help with stress and development?     Our building blocks are a great way to relieve stress and engage in meaningful and joyful conversations. As children comment on their building creations, they develop essential communication skills, including explaining ideas, describing their work, talking about the process, and verbalising challenges that they had along the way. 

    Are these compatible with other leading brands? Yes, these are nano blocks so they are compatible with leading nano blocks. 


    CHOKING HAZARD: Small parts. Not for children under 6 years old

     

  • We are proud to offer FREE tracked shipping to over 300 countries worldwide including the United States, United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, Germany, France, Italy, Austria, Netherlands, and many others. If you are wondering if we ship to your country please head over to our Shipping Policy.

    Packaging time: 1-3 Business days

    Shipping time: Est 5-30 Business days
